full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### RFP Number and Title

* RFP Title (English): Acquisition of a Floating Waste Collector - RFP
* RFP Number: WS4275472814

### General Information

* Publication Date: October 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 22, 2023 (14:00:00)
* Amendment Date: November 15, 2023
* Contract Start Date: December 1, 2023 (tentative)
* Contract End Date: None

### Procurement Details

* Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* UNspsc Codes: 
  * 41100000: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
  * 47101500: Water Treatment and Supply Equipment

### End-User Entity Information

* End-User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Contact Information

* Contact Person: Simoneau, Steve
* Contact Email: steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: Not available
* Contact Fax: Not available

### Tender Notice

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada for the acquisition of floating waste collector equipment, as detailed in Annex A. The RFP calls for the supply of the equipment and its subsequent installation.

The RFP will be evaluated based on the lowest price, in accordance with the Statement of Work (SOW) and the Tender Evaluation Criteria. The duly completed and corrected offerings must be sent by the tender closing date to avoid rejection.

### Tender Notice Information

* Tender Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17866386?extsite=MTc4NjYzODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information for submissions: None

### Note

Please note that this tender has expired. Thus, cannot be submitted below. I tried sticking to the available details as much as possible to keep the output within the 400-word limit. Also, the document was vast, so I chose to only include the highest priority information, while excluding other detailed data.
